name: Dirt Bike Extreme ( 3D Racing Games )
description: Take the challenge in this DIRT BIKE Extreme. Race your Dirt Bike as fast as you can to be able to keep up with your rivals and win this awesome Dirt Bike Rally.For Much Fun Imagine being in an arena trying to control your bike across different Off Road Tracks, it's tricky... so you have to control the bike and try your best not to fall off. Careful control will allow you to compete everyone, no matter how intense they get!
